name: TheDallasMorningNews
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Hear the Dallas Morning News’ award-winning coverage in audio form. Our short news summaries are available Monday-Friday. To begin, go to Settings in your Alexa app, find "Flash Briefing" and move Dallas News* to the top of your list. Now simply say "Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?"
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
